description: WazirX users affected by the $230 million (roughly Rs. 1,970 crore) hack are set to face further delays before their money is reimbursed. On Wednesday, the Singapore High Court rejected the crypto exchange's restructuring scheme, despite it receiving approval from creditors in April. WazirX requires the court's permission to execute the restructuring plan and repay affected users.
title: WazirX Restructuring Plan Rejected By Singapore High Court; Crypto Firm to Appeal Decision

description: India’s longest railway tunnel is currently being constructed deep in the Himalayan mountains. Dubbed Tunnel No. 8 or T-8, it will be a 14.57km tunnel between Rishikesh and Karnaprayag, and connect Devprayag and Janasu in Uttarakhand. While the length of the tunnel in itself is a major engineering achievement, the technology that went into the excavation and construction of the structure in such challenging terrains also deserves recognition.
title: TBM ‘Shakti’: The Tech Behind India’s Longest Railway Tunnel Between Rishikesh and Karnaprayag

description: Manus unveiled a text-to-video generation feature. The upstart, whose AI service is known for its ability to carry out multistep tasks the way humans do, said users can now similarly generate videos with text instructions.
title: AI Upstart Manus Starts Text-to-Video Service to Take On OpenAI

description: Apple is gearing up to preview its yearly operating system (OS) releases at WWDC 2025 next week. So far, the rumour mill has highlighted big changes coming to iOS, iPadOS, and macOS with regards to their interface and naming strategy. However, this does not mean Apple overlooks visionOS, which powers the Apple Vision Pro. A recent report indicates that the mixed reality headset could benefit from expanded support for peripheral gamepads such as PlayStation, Xbox, and spatial controllers.
title: Apple Vision Pro to Get Native Support for PlayStation, Xbox and Spatial Controllers With visionOS 26: Report

description: The Australian Transaction Reports and Analysis Centre (AUSTRAC) has enforced a deposit and withdrawal limit of AUD 5,000 (roughly Rs. 2.78 lakh) on transactions processed via crypto ATMs. The agency highlighted that elderly individuals are purchasing cryptocurrencies via cash -- with many falling prey to notorious scams and fraudulent schemes.
title: Australia Limits Crypto ATM Transactions to AUD 5,000 in Bid to Curb Scams, Money Laundering

description: Google introduced new audio generation capabilities with the Gemini 2.5 models at the Google I/O 2025. The Mountain View-based tech giant is now letting developers and individuals test these features on its platform. The two new capabilities include native audio dialog and controllable text-to-speech (TTS) with Gemini 2.5 Flash preview.
title: Google Opens Access to Gemini 2.5 Native Audio Dialog and Controllable Speech Generation in Preview

description: Google Weather in Search is reportedly testing a new artificial intelligence (AI) feature that will show a short text summary of current weather conditions. As per the report, the feature currently shows up for some US cities, and describes local conditions such as wind, probability of rain, any pressure-system build-up, and temperature patterns.
title: Google Weather in Search Reportedly Testing AI-Powered Summaries In Some Cities

description: South Korean automakers Hyundai Motor and Kia sold about 136 million shares in Ola Electric Mobility on Tuesday. While Hyundai offloaded 108.8 million shares at an average price of 50.7 rupees (59 cents), Kia sold 27.17 million shares at 50.55 rupees a share. Ola Electric shares fall after 3.3 percent of equity traded in blocks.
title: Hyundai, Kia Sell Stake in Ola Electric, Exacerbating Share Slump

description: After using TSMC’s 3nm process for its iPhone 15 Pro and iPhone 16 Pro series, Apple seems to be in a position to switch to an even more efficient 2nm manufacturing process, for its future iPhone 18 Pro models. The 2nm node is expected to bring better power efficiency among other benefits.
title: iPhone 18 Pro, iPhone 18 Pro Max and iPhone 18 Fold Said to Debut With 2nm A20 Chipset in 2026

description: Don’t miss Nizharkudai, the moving Tamil drama about dreams, caregiving, and emotional choices—now streaming on Aha Tamil.
title: Nizharkudai Now Streaming on Aha Tamil: What You Need to Know About Tamil Family Drama

description: OnePlus 13s is all set to go official in India on Thursday (June 5). The launch event will be streamed live on YouTube. Building up hype around the launch of the OnePlus 13s, the Chinese electronics giant has posted teasers revealing several details of the phone. It is confirmed to come in three colourways in the country with a compact form factor. The OnePlus 13s is equipped with a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset.
title: OnePlus 13s India Launch Tomorrow: Expected Price, Specifications and How to Watch Livestream

description: OnePlus 13s is all set to launch in India on Thursday (June 5). Just a day before the formal reveal, Amazon accidently listed the smartphone, confirming several of its hardware details. The OnePlus 13s is listed with a dual rear camera unit led by a 50-megapixel primary shooter. It packs a 5,850mAh battery and was listed with 12GB RAM and up to 512GB storage. The OnePlus 13s is confirmed to run on the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset.
title: OnePlus 13s Key Specifications Revealed via Amazon Listing Ahead of June 5 Launch

description: OpenAI is now rolling out ChatGPT’s memory improvements to those on the free tier of the platform. Announced on Tuesday, the San Francisco-based artificial intelligence (AI) firm announced that now all users of the chatbot will get personalised responses based on their previous conversations with ChatGPT. Notably, the free users are getting a lightweight version of the feature.
title: OpenAI Is Rolling Out ChatGPT’s Memory Improvements to Free Users; Codex Gets Full Internet Access

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 series could offer access to Perplexity's AI assistant as part of a new, "wide-ranging" deal, according to a Bloomberg report. This collaboration might also see Perplexity's AI features extend to the company's apps, such as Samsung Internet and its virtual assistant, Bixby. The move follows Perplexity's recent partnership with Motorola, further expanding its AI integration into Android smartphones.
title: Perplexity Could be Default AI Assistant on Samsung Galaxy S26 as Part of 'Wide-Ranging' Deal: Report

description: Poco F7 is expected to arrive in select global markets later this month. A new report has suggested the expected launch timeline of the handset. The phone may be introduced in India at the same time. It has shared the probable key features of the purported smartphone. The global and Indian variants of the standard Poco F7 are tipped to come with different battery sizes.
title: Poco F7 Global Launch Timeline Leaked; Indian Variant Tipped to Feature Larger Battery

description: Qualcomm has issued patches for several critical security flaws, including three zero-day vulnerabilities, which the chipmaker warns may have been actively exploited by hackers. These vulnerabilities primarily impact the Adreno GPU driver across several Qualcomm-powered devices. Users will have to wait for updates from device manufacturers to receive these security patches.
title: Qualcomm Fixes Zero-Day Security Vulnerabilities Used By Hackers, Cybercriminals

description: Realme 15 5G is expected to launch in India as a successor to Realme 14 5G. Realme is yet to formally confirm its existence, but a new leak suggests the Realme 15's possible colour options, RAM and storage details. It is said to come in three finishes and four RAM and storage configurations in the country. It is tipped to pack up to 12GB of RAM and a maximum 512GB of storage.
title: Realme 15 5G to Be Available in Four Memory Configurations, Three Colour Options: Report

description: A telecom group representing Reliance Jio and Bharti Airtel has raised concerns that artificially low satellite spectrum pricing in India could negatively impact their operations. Indian telecom giants, through this group, have said that low spectrum rates could give foreign players like Starlink an unfair advantage.
title: Reliance, Airtel Group Challenges 'Low' India Satcom Fee Which Can Help Starlink

description: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 is expected to launch in July alongside the Galaxy Z Flip 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7 FE. Ahead of the formal reveal, the RAM and storage details and colour options of the upcoming foldable phones have been tipped online. The Galaxy Z Fold 7 is said to feature 16GB of RAM, which would be 4GB more than the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 6. The Galaxy Z Flip 7 is expected to be available in three RAM and storage versions.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7, Galaxy Z Flip 7, Galaxy Z Flip 7 FE Colourways, RAM and Storage Options Leaked Ahead of Debut

description: Sony has announced a State of Play presentation featuring upcoming PS5 games for June 4. The broadcast will include updates on a selection of games from third-party developers and likely share details on first-party PlayStation titles. The State of Play event is confirmed to be over 40 minutes long.
title: Sony's State of Play Broadcast Announced for June 4: How to Watch, What to Expect

description: Tales of Kenzera: Zau developer Surgent Studios has revealed its next game, Dead Take. It will be a narrative-driven psychological horror title published by Palworld maker Pocketpair. Dead Take will explore power and corruption in the entertainment industry, the developer said.
title: Tales of Kenzera: Zau Developer Announces Horror Game Dead Take, Pocketpair Set to Publish

description: Vi has partnered with Vivo India to announce an exclusive prepaid bundle offering 5G connectivity and free access to OTT platforms for Vivo V50e buyers. With this bundled plan, Vi prepaid users in India can enjoy OTT and Live TV subscriptions for up to 12 months. They can also get unlimited calling benefits alongside 3GB of daily data. This offer is available for existing Vi users as well as new customers.
title: Vi, Vivo Partner to Offer Vivo V50e Buyers in India an Exclusive 5G Bundled Plan

description: Motorola Razr 60 was unveiled in India on May 28 and is now available for purchase. The phone is available in a single 8GB RAM and 256GB storage configuration. It comes in three different back panel options, including a fabric-like finish, a marble-like variant, and a vegan leather version. The handset carries an IP48-rated dust and water-resistant build. The Razr 60 is backed by a MediaTek Dimensity 7400X chipset and a 4,500mAh battery.
title: Motorola Razr 60 Now Available for Purchase in India: Price, Offers, Specifications

description: The valuation of the crypto sector rose slightly by 0.41 percent in the last 24 hours. Bitcoin and Ether, both saw minor gains on Wednesday, June 4. Tether, Ripple, and Solana also registered small profits on the price chart.
title: Bitcoin Stabilises at Around $105,500, Most Altcoins See Minor Profits

description: Apple on Wednesday announced the list of winners and finalists of the Design Awards 2025 across several app and game categories. Presented each year since 1996, the annual awards commemorate developers and their work on bringing innovation and technical advancements to their apps across Apple devices like iPhone, iPad, and mac. A total of 12 standout apps and games have been announced as the winners this year.
title: Apple Design Awards 2025 Winners Announced: CapWords, Speechify and Neva Bag Top Spots

description: Google’s NotebookLM added a new feature on Tuesday to make it easier for users to share their notebooks publicly. The artificial intelligence (AI) notes summarising platform is now adding a new Share button that will allow users to share a link to their notebooks with others. The feature works similarly to the share option on Google Docs and Slides.
title: Google’s NotebookLM Adds Feature to Let Users Share Notebooks Publicly

description: Honor Magic V5 is said to go official in China soon. While the launch date of the foldable phone remains unverified, an alleged Geekbench listing has now suggested its possible model number and specifications. The Honor Magic V5 is listed with the Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC on the benchmarking website. The listing suggests that the phone will carry the model number Honor MHG-AN00.
title: Honor Magic V5 Allegedly Listed on Geekbench, Suggesting Key Specifications

description: Huawei Pura 80 series will be introduced in China on June 11. Huawei has confirmed the operating system details of the series as well. The lineup is expected to include a Pura 80, Pura 80 Pro, a Pura 80 Pro+ and an Ultra variant, similar to the Pura 70 series, which was unveiled in the country in April 2024.
title: Huawei Pura 80 Series Launch Date Set for June 11; Key Camera Specifications Leaked

description: In a stunning tech demo at the State of Unreal presentation on Tuesday, Epic Games and CD Projekt Red showed off the world of The Witcher 4 and the technology that powers the game. The technical build was not actual gameplay from the RPG, but it revealed the northern region of Kovir, which will be present in the game.
title: The Witcher 4 Unreal Engine 5 Tech Demo Shows Stunning Open World, but CD Projekt Red Warns Its Not Gameplay

description: Vivo T4 Ultra's India launch date has been finally confirmed. Alongside confirming the exact launch date, the company has revealed the colour options and teased some of the key features of the handset. Meanwhile, several leaks and reports over the past few weeks have also hinted at the expected key specifications of the handset. The upcoming Vivo T4 Ultra will join the base Vivo T4 5G and the Vivo T4x 5G.
title: Vivo T4 Ultra India Launch Date Set for June 11; Colour Options, Key Features Teased

description: Adobe Photoshop app was launched for Android users on Wednesday, nearly four months after its iOS counterpart was released. The app takes the array of editing features provided by the US-based company in its desktop application and packages it for the Android platform. The Photoshop app for Android (beta) lets users take advantage of artificial intelligence (AI) features like Generative Fill which is powered by Adobe's Firefly AI model.
title: Adobe Photoshop for Android App With Firefly-Powered Generative Fill Released in Beta

description: Pixel 10 series is rumoured to be unveiled on August 20. As the possible launch date nears, we are seeing new leaks about their specifications. The base Pixel 10 is believed to come with a revamped camera unit, including a telephoto lens for the first time. Meanwhile, a fresh leak suggests that the Pixel 10 family will get a significant upgrade when comes to image stabilisation. The Pixel 10 series is said to offer video stabilisation comparable to that of a gimbal.
title: Google Pixel 10 Series to Reportedly Offer Gimbal-Like Video Stabilisation

description: iOS 26 will be unveiled at Apple's Worldwide Developers Conference (WWDC 2025), and leaked details about the upcoming OS update indicates that new features will be announced for Apple's built-in applications, such as Apple Music, Messages, Notes, and CarPlay.
title: iOS 26 to Bring Message Translation, Animated Lock Screen Album Artwork and Revamped CarPlay UI: Report

description: The Accountant 2 is a crime thriller movie that follows Christine Wolff, portrayed by Ben Affleck, who uses his exceptional mindset to solve the most complex murder mystery with one clue. The stakes are higher, and so is the action. Streaming starts from June 5th, 2025, only on Prime Video.
title: The Accountant 2 OTT Release Date: When and Whee to Watch it Online?

description: The Fire And The Moth, a Nigerian movie, is the story of a smuggler who lives on the western side of Nigeria. He ends up stealing a Bronze Ife head to improve his life, but instead, he faces significant consequences. Stuck in a situation for his life, with guilt, survival, and protecting his loved ones, he finds himself fighting for his life, like the movie title.
title: The Fire And The Moth Now Streaming on Amazon Prime Video

description: The Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS), recently outlined certain requirements to be fulfilled by the "Digital Token Service Providers (DTSPs) in Singapore, in order to establish more control over crypto-related services. The MAS has also decided to limit licensing for DTSPs.
title: Singapore Directs Crypto Firms to Halt Overseas Operations in Crackdown on Unlicensed Providers

description: Vivo X Fold 5 has been teased to weigh less than its preceding model and a new teaser now shows the thickness of the upcoming book-style foldable. It is expected to be considerably slimmer than the X Fold 3. The latest teaser compares the thickness of Vivo's X Fold 5 to the iPhone 16 Pro Max. In the images shared, the foldable appears to be only slightly thicker than the iPhone.
title: Vivo X Fold 5 Compared to iPhone 16 Pro Max; to Be Only Slightly Thicker When Folded

description: Samsung on Wednesday teased a new foldable product that could join its flagship book-style Galaxy Z Fold 7 this year. Calling it the “next chapter” of Galaxy, the purported device is ubiquitously being called the Galaxy Z Fold 7 Ultra which could join the vanilla Galaxy Z Fold 7, Galaxy Z Flip 7, and the new Galaxy Z Flip 7 FE this year. It is said to be a new device which blends industry-leading hardware, high performance, and integration of artificial intelligence (AI) capabilities.
title: Samsung Teases ‘Ultra’ Foldable; May Debut Alongside Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7

description: Telegram on Tuesday rolled out a new update for its app which makes it easier to start conversations, navigate topics, and trim voice messages. It enables users to send direct messages to channels and have discreet chats with channel owners and admins via a new mode. The company is also adding a new tab layout for topics in groups for quick access and a new way to trim voice messages before sending them.
title: Telegram Update Brings DMs to Channels, Voice Message Trimming, and More Features
